mercy.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: if someone shows mercy, they choose to forgive or to be kind to someone who they have the power to hurt or punish
mercy.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: He showed no mercy to his enemies.
God have mercy on his soul.
The boy was screaming and begging for mercy.
mercy.translation[0].note_box[0].section: ‘God have mercy on me!’ Miss Barton cried.
He showed no mercy to those who had angered him.
The only thing I can do now is ask for mercy.
She continued the punishment, although they begged for mercy.
He screamed for mercy, shouting 'don't shoot!'.
God in his great mercy has forgiven you.
Will we still receive God's mercy if we refuse to repent?
